PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02982010-03-19,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of SHERRY H. STEWART of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 2, 2010.
